main: ^You do work at that ranch down south of here, that right?
^Never heard anything about an arm out of Revelations, though.
^Seems like you could use a drink.
^I'll probably be fighting for my life in a few hours. Might be better off sober.
^I hear Beth's sending you into town. Word of advice: There's been something shady going on over there for a while now. At Micah's church, but other places too.
^You'd better look around, turn over every nook and cranny.
^Something shady? Can you be more specific?
^Yeah. Folk around that I don't recognize.
^The sheriffs didn't seem particularly keen to look into it, either.
